title: Simple baked doughnuts with prawns, chorizo and cheese
description: Doughnuts take on a savoury twist here with a cheesy chorizo and prawn filling. Great for an informal canapé. You will need a 12-hole doughnut mould.
ingredients: 2 green chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped
150ml/5fl oz–200ml/7fl oz groundnut or sunflower oil
